column3: Regarding patent issues, read this: http://cr.yp.to/patents/us/6141420.html\n

Spiffy!
Could you create unit tests and a test plan?
For example, if I want to test use of compressed and uncompressed keys... I would run with/without the -compressedpubkeys option, but do I need to use up old uncompressed keypool keys before I get compressed keys?

For testing, you probably want to be able to mix compressed and uncompressed keys. For production use, you probably want to just switch once and for all, so -compressedpubkeys would better flush all non-compressed keys in the keypool.\n
I think we should just make compressed keys the default; I don't see any reason to continue supporting/generating/etc the larger uncompressed keys.\n

Ok, compressed pubkeys are now enabled by default in the pull request (the key pool isn't flushed, though)

I'll add some unit tests soon.
